snippet.title: Bright in the screen walkthrough
snippet.description:
Walkthrough for www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/469443.
Now you can skip most of the fun! 
The game shown may differ from the actual game.
Also, the actual game does not end there, there still a lot more to come... but you won't need the walkthrough in those parts...
P.S. Stupid mouse not showing because of the stupid recorder I used, stupid.
